name: sᴀɴᴛʜᴜ ᴠɪᴅᴇᴏ ʙᴏᴛ
description: Telegram bot for Streaming Video & Music Through the Telegram Group Video Chat, powered by PyTgCalls and Pyrogram

BOT_USERNAME.description: fill with your bot username from @BotFather but without using '@' symbol

BOT_NAME.description: fill with your bot name from @BotFather

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: fill with the assistant username account without @

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram String Session

MONGODB_URL.description: fill with the mongodb url you created from cloud.mongodb.com

SUDO_USERS.description: list of user id to be added to sudo member list, or just fill with your id

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: This is needed for update feature, if you deployed forked repo put your forked repo link here, if not just leave it as it

GROUP_SUPPORT.description: if you have group, then fill the group username here without @

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: if you have channel, then fill the channel username here without @

OWNER_NAME.description: fill with your telegram account username without @

ALIVE_NAME.description: fill with your telegram account nickname/name
